about_the_game:
Crimson Harvest is a Farming Simulator Horror Game with PS1 style graphics and 2.5D elements that combine traditional farming mechanics like crop growing and resource management with aspects of survival horror by including different monsters with unique behaviors to keep track of throughout the week.

After Inheriting your grandfather's old family farm, you're unsure of what to do with it. But after finding strange notes left behind detailing a harvest needing to be completed by the week's end and strange creatures lurking in the woods, it seems he may have had a reason for you to be here.

Key features and mechanics

  • Planting, watering, and harvesting mechanics for farming 6 different crops.

  • Balance whether to sell your crops for money to buy more seeds and upgrades or add them to the pile to have enough crops for the harvest.

  • Play through seven days trying to grow enough crops for the harvest at the end.

  • Survive a list of different horrific creatures progressively introduced each day, each with their own sets of behaviors and mechanics.

  • Manage items and resources with a limited inventory and hotbar.
